issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

nothing new about this, just noting to see if such things are under our control/an actual bug
Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (03/23/11 09:50 87caf1e...)

1.Controls > Picker > Time Picker
2.select any value on the picker and check the text label on top of the screen (the last value shown), specifically time off gtm

results:
3g iphone: -0700
iphone4 (4.3): +0000
4gt ipod touch (4.3): +0000
ipad2(4.3): +0000

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: time picker value diferences for gmt across devices/ios sdk versions

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this is related to the old version of Kitchen Sink, which we no longer support.
